title: hypre@2.11.1 fails to build with %intel@16.0.3
body:
* hypre@2.10.1 works fine (I'll use this for now).
* hypre@2.11.1~internal-superlu also works fine.
* I'm use external packages for:
  * intel/16.0.3
  * openmpi/1.10.3
  * mkl/11.3.3.210
* Using 'develop' branch: 85a05681ccd60be4c367bca323e0f45024f0c7f2
* I'm not sure if this is a spack issue or a hypre issue.

```
$ spack spec hypre
Input spec
--------------------------------
hypre

Normalized
--------------------------------
hypre
    ^blas
    ^lapack
    ^mpi

Concretized
--------------------------------
hypre@2.11.1%intel@16.0.3+internal-superlu+shared arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
    ^mkl@11.3.3.210%intel@16.0.3~ilp64~openmp+shared arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
    ^openmpi@1.10.3%intel@16.0.3~mxm~pmi~psm~psm2~slurm~sqlite3~thread_multiple~tm+verbs+vt arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64
```

```
$ spack install hypre
==> Installing hypre
==> mkl is externally installed in /usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/intel-clusterstudio/2016.3.067/compilers_and_libraries_2016.3.210/linux/mkl
==> openmpi is externally installed in /usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/snow/openmpi/1.10.3-intel-16.0.3
==> Using cached archive: /yellow/usr/projects/draco/vendors/spack.sn.20161114/var/spack/cache/hypre/hypre-2.11.1.tar.gz
==> Staging archive: /yellow/usr/projects/draco/vendors/spack.sn.20161114/var/spack/stage/hypre-2.11.1-oqd452gn6j74dbbpyuye5sefujy4whkh/hypre-2.11.1.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /yellow/usr/projects/draco/vendors/spack.sn.20161114/var/spack/stage/hypre-2.11.1-oqd452gn6j74dbbpyuye5sefujy4whkh
==> No patches needed for hypre
==> Building hypre [Package]
==> Executing phase : 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
...
See build log for details:
  /tmp/kellyt/spack-stage/spack-stage-qYaSgC/hypre-2.11.1/spack-build.out
```

[spack-build.out](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/592628/spack-build.out.txt)

packages.yaml:
```
packages:
  mkl:
    compiler: [intel@16.0.3]
    paths:
      mkl@11.3.3.210%intel@16.0.3 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64: /usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/common/intel-clusterstudio/2016.3.067/compilers_and_libraries_2016.3.210/linux/mkl
    buildable: False
  openmpi:
    version: [1.10.3]
    paths:
      openmpi@1.10.3%intel@16.0.3 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64: /usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/snow/openmpi/1.10.3-intel-16.0.3
      openmpi@1.10.3%gcc@5.3.0 arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64: /usr/projects/hpcsoft/toss3/snow/openmpi/1.10.3-gcc-5.3.0
    buildable: False
  all:
    compiler: [intel@16.0.3]
    providers:
      mpi: [openmpi@1.10.3]
      blas: [mkl@11.3.3.210]
      lapack: [mkl@11.3.3.210]
```
